statements: DELETE FROM network_traffic_logs WHERE log_id = 100 AND protocol = 'TCP';
DELETE FROM network_traffic_logs WHERE status_code = 404 AND destination_ip = '192.168.1.10';
DELETE FROM security_breaches WHERE breach_type = 'Data Leak';
DELETE FROM security_breaches WHERE breach_type = 'Malware' AND log_id IN (SELECT id FROM network_traffic_logs WHERE source_ip = '192.168.1.1');
DELETE FROM network_traffic_logs WHERE timestamp < '2021-09-01' AND id NOT IN (SELECT log_id FROM security_breaches);
DELETE FROM security_events WHERE severity = 'High' AND timestamp > '2022-05-01';
DELETE FROM security_breaches WHERE breach_type = 'Data Theft';
DELETE FROM breach_details WHERE detected_by = 'Intrusion Detection System';
DELETE FROM security_admins WHERE admin_role = 'admin' AND admin_name = 'John Doe';
